Posts.EditableText:
[quote="elexxorine":3ao44i7u]You mean calubus? He was looking for india and got lost, found america instead. That's why native americans are called [i:3ao44i7u]indians[/i:3ao44i7u]! lol![/quote:3ao44i7u]

That was in the Atlantic and more specific, the Carribean Sea where he landed.  Christopher Columbus, 1492, FYI.  He never actually set foot on the continent.  You'll have to give credit to the Vikings for that some 600 years earlier although it was in Canada.
